name: Reblock
description:
Fast reflexes and smart strategy are joined in this frantic puzzle game. Drag blocks to form rows and columns of equal blocks and see how they are sent as attacks to your opponent! It's so satisfaying watch how an enemy falls powerless under lots of blocks! It's also so satisfaying to counter your opponent's attack and take revenge! Be fast but stay focused on finding the best moves to maximize the damage you deal. Be aware also of the warning sounds of inminent huge attacks! Use bombs, diamonds and purgers strategically to low your blocks' stack hight and send a powerfull attack at the same time! This puzzle game won't give you a break.

★6 game modes

★4 levels of difficulty

★Help menu teaches you clearly how to play

★Play against the CPU or even best, against a friend locally or over local network

★Joystick compatible beside mouse and keyboard

★Solve challenging puzzles with limited amount of movements

★Create, edit and share puzzles with the included puzzle editor

★Available for Windows and Android

★Leaderboard shows record scores and times

★In english and spanish
